actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to eliminate the exemption of Members of Congress from the provision of such Act relating to limitations on the use of certain contributions.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit any Member of Congress from using funds received as contributions to pay personal expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to eliminate the exemption of Members of Congress from the provision of such Act relating to limitations on the use of certain contributions.
